name: Gao Pet
description:
/!\ WIP

This prototype was made during the Ludum Dare 49 game jam in jam mode.

This jam's theme was "Unstable".

In this game, you are the owner of a cute little animal. You have to take good care of your pet or he will start to do some bad stuff in the city.

Beware ! Your pet will get more and more unstable the longer you stay in the game !

Team members : 

Teo MARTIN : Developer

Damien LECLERQ : Producer & Game Designer

Paul Makary : Game Artist

All the assets used can be found here : 

- https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-cat-sprites

- https://raou.itch.io/top-down-interior-tileset

- https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-8bit-topdown
